mapper.select: SELECT OTT_NO, OTT_NAME, OTT_THUMB, OTT_CLASS, OTT_MAX_MEMBER, PLAN_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PLAN_PRICE,'999,999') AS PLAN_PRICE_OUTPUT, TO_CHAR((PLAN_PRICE / OTT_MAX_MEMBER),'999,999') AS PLAN_EACH_PRICE, PLAN_NAME, OTT_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY OTT_NAME ORDER BY PLAN_PRICE DESC ) AS RNUM, OTT_INFO.* FROM OTT_INFO) WHERE RNUM=1 ORDER BY OTT_NO
SELECT OTT_NO, OTT_NAME, OTT_THUMB, OTT_CLASS, OTT_MAX_MEMBER, PLAN_PRICE, TO_CHAR(PLAN_PRICE,'999,999') AS PLAN_PRICE_OUTPUT, PLAN_NAME, OTT_STATUS FROM OTT_INFO WHERE OTT_NAME = #{ottName}
SELECT PLAN_NAME, OTT_NO FROM OTT_INFO WHERE OTT_NO=#{ottNo}
SELECT PLAN_NAME, OTT_NO, OTT_THUMB, PLAN_PRICE FROM OTT_INFO WHERE OTT_NO=#{modal_ott_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY( P_NO, OTT_NO, P_SHARE_ID, P_SHARE_PWD, P_MAX_MEMBER, P_START_DATE, P_PERIOD, P_END_DATE, P_ACCOUNTS, P_ENTRY_PRICE ) VALUES( SEQ_PARTY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ott_no}, #{p_share_id}, #{p_share_pwd}, #{p_max_member}, #{p_start_date}, #{p_period}, #{p_end_date}, #{p_accounts}, #{p_entry_price} )
mapper.select: SELECT P.P_NO, P.OTT_NO, P.P_SHARE_ID, P.P_SHARE_PWD, P.P_MAX_MEMBER, P.P_CUR_MEMBER, P.P_START_DATE, P.P_PERIOD, P.P_END_DATE, P.P_COMMENT, P.P_ENTRY_PRICE, P.P_STATUS, P.P_CAUTION1, P.P_CAUTION2, P.P_CAUTION3, O.OTT_NAME, O.OTT_THUMB, O.PLAN_NAME, O.PLAN_PRICE FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(P.OTT_NO = O.OTT_NO) WHERE O.OTT_NAME=#{ottName} ORDER BY P.P_NO

SELECT P.P_NO, P.OTT_NO, P.P_SHARE_ID, P.P_SHARE_PWD, P.P_MAX_MEMBER, P.P_CUR_MEMBER, P.P_START_DATE, P.P_PERIOD, P.P_END_DATE, P.P_COMMENT, P.P_ENTRY_PRICE, P.P_STATUS, P.P_CAUTION1, P.P_CAUTION2, P.P_CAUTION3, P.P_ACCOUNTS, TO_CHAR(P.P_ENTRY_PRICE,'999,999') AS P_ENTRY_PRICE_OUTPUT, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(P.P_END_DATE,SYSDATE)) AS ACCOUNTS_COUNT, TO_CHAR(((P.P_ENTRY_PRICE * 0.1) * MONTHS_BETWEEN(P.P_END_DATE,SYSDATE)) ,'999,999') AS P_DEPOSIT, O.OTT_NAME, O.OTT_THUMB, O.PLAN_NAME, O.PLAN_PRICE FROM PARTY P JOIN OTT_INFO O ON(P.OTT_NO = O.OTT_NO) WHERE P.P_NO=#{no}
